thread.title: Marty Ingels, husband of Shirley Jones, dies at 79
thread.title_full: Marty Ingels, husband of Shirley Jones, dies at 79

title: Marty Ingels, husband of Shirley Jones, dies at 79
text: > Entertainment Marty Ingels, husband of Shirley Jones, dies at 79 FILE - In this April 10, 2014 file photo, Marty Ingels arrives at 2014 TCM Classic Film Festival's Opening Night Gala at the TCL Chinese Theatre in Los Angeles. Ingels, a comedian, actor and talent agent who was married to actress Shirley Jones for nearly 40 years, died Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015 in Los Angeles following complications from a stroke. He was 79. (Photo by Annie I. Bang /Invision/AP, File)
